original: Yathā gāmasmātiādinā idaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ kāyasaṃsaggapubbakova visileso, kiñcarahi

original: buddhisaṃsaggapubbakopi, atthi ceha buddhisaṃsagga pubbako, tathāhi corehi bhāyatityādo
analyzed: buddhi saṃsagga pubbakaḥ api atthi ca iha tathā hi corehi

original: yo (bhaya)pekkhaṇa sīlo bhavati, so yadi maṃ corā passeyyuṃ, dhuvaṃ me maraṇanti

original: vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tato nivattate, tathā corehi tāyatityādo
analyzed: vicārento te buddhiyā pappoti pappuyya ca tatas nivattate tathā corehi

original: yo ekassa mitto bhavati so yadyetaṃ corā passeyyuṃ dhuvamassa maraṇanti passanto
analyzed: yaḥ ekassa mittaḥ bhavati saḥ yadi etam corā passeyyum passantaḥ

original: te buddhiyā patvā tato nivattayatītyavadhittā avadhismāva sabbattha pañcamī”ti, parehi
analyzed: te buddhiyā patvā tatas nivattayati iti avadhittā sabbattha pañcamī iti parehi

original: pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattuvisesānuggahāya sutteheva papañco kato, idha pana
analyzed: pana etādisesu sabbattha paṭipattu visesa anuggahāya suttehi iva papañcaḥ kataḥ idha pana

original: sāmaññavacaneneva siddhattā tadanuggahāya udāharaṇeheva papañcitaṃ, bhītibhāyanatthānanti
analyzed: sāmañña vacanena iva tad anuggahāya udāharaṇehi iva papañcitam

original: bhīti tāyanānaṃ attho yesaṃ te bhītitāyanatthā tesanti attho, nanu bhītyatthānaṃ
analyzed: bhīti tāyanānam atthaḥ yesam te bhīti tāyana tthā tesam ti atthaḥ nanu bhīti atthānam

original: payoge bhayahetu sambhavati natu tāyanatthānanti, nesa doso, tāyanañhi rakkhanamuccate
analyzed: payoge bhaya hetu sambhavati na tu na isa doso tāyanan hi rakkhanam uccate

original: sāyanāhi rakkhanamuppajjabhe (potthake) tañca bhayahetuto vetyāha-‘yo bhayahetu’tiādi,
analyzed: rakkhanam uppajja bhe potthake tat ca bhaya hetutaḥ vā iti āhayaḥ bhaya hetu tiādi

original: iminā ca “bhītyatthānaṃ bhayahetu”ti (1-4-25) pāṇiniyānamapādānasaññā suttampaṭikkhipati,
analyzed: iminā ca bhīti atthānam bhaya hetu ti  pāṇi niyānam apādāna saññā suttam paṭikkhipati

original: tatoti bhayahetuto, tesanti bhayatāyanānaṃ, bhayamaniṭṭhapātasaṅkā, uttāsotyattho,
analyzed: tatas ti bhaya hetuto tesanti bhaya tāyanānam bhaya maniṭṭha pāta saṅkā

original: tāyana maniṭṭhapātato parirakkhanaṃ, yathā dassanaṃ hontevātīminā vacanicchāyeva
analyzed: parirakkhanam yathā dassanam vacanicchāyā iva

original: padhānattamāha, ko hi lokiyaṃ vacanicchamativattituṃ sakkoti, tathāhi sabbeva dabbādayo
analyzed: āha kaḥ hi lokiyam vacaniccham ativattitum sakkoti tathā hi sabbe iva dabba ādayaḥ

original: vijjotate, valāhakena vijjotate, valāhake vijjotate’ti. Parāpubbassātiādinā “parājissāsayho”ti
analyzed: vijjotate valāhakena vijjotate valāhake vijjotate iti parāpubbassa ati ādinā

original: (1-4-26) saññāsuttaṃ paccakkhāti, asayho atthoti sahituṃ abhibhavitumasamattho attho,
analyzed: saññā suttam paccakkhāti a sayhaḥ attho ti sahitum abhibhavitum asamatthaḥ attho

original: ajjhenasakāsāiccādinā udāharaṇatthamācikkhati, nanucevamatthaṃ vadatā yaññadattassāsayhattaṃ

original: vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ ajjhayanassāsayhattaṃ, yenāsayhattassāvadhittaṃ paṭipādayati tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘yaññadattānabhibhavo’ccādi,
analyzed: vuttam tam katham ajjhayanassa a sayhattam paṭipādayati

original: (1-4-27) suttitaṃ, tadāha ‘vāraṇatthāna’miccādi, vāraṇamattho yesaṃ te vāraṇatthā,

original: avadhimattavacanicchāyanti visesato vidhānamantarenā vadhimatta vacanicchāyaṃ, visesavidhāneti

original: icchitoti visesavidhāne, cittassāvadhivacanicchāyampana cittato pāpaṃ nivārayeti
analyzed: icchitā ti visesa vidhāne cittataḥ pāpam nivāraya iti

original: bhavati. “Rakkhanatthānamicchita”nti (2-6-3) suttitaṃ, tadāha-‘rakkhanatthāna’miccādi,
analyzed: bhavati rakkhana thānam icchitanti tat āha rakkhana thānam iccādi

original: kesañcīti kaccāyanādike dasseti. “Antaradhāne yenādassanamicchatī”ti (1-4-28) saññāsuttamāraddhaṃ,
analyzed: kesañci iti kaccāyana ādike dassa iti antaradhāne yena a dassanam icchati iti saññā suttam āraddham

analyzed: tat āha antaradhāna iccādi ayam upajjhāyaḥ yadi mamam passati iti sambandhaḥ dassane dosam

original: takketi ‘nuna’miccādinā, pesanamasakkārapubbako niyogo, ajjhesanaṃ sakkārapubbako,
analyzed: takka iti nunam iccādinā pesanam a sakkāra pubbakaḥ niyogaḥ ajjhesanam sakkāra pubbakaḥ

analyzed: maññamāno sissā aham kathannāma byavahitaḥ bhavāmi iti antaradhāne byavadhāna nimittam

original: āha-‘byavadhānanimitta’nti, byavahitoti antarahito, māmaṃ upajjhāyotyādinā udāharaṇatthamāha,

original: byavadhānatthaṃ byavahitatthaṃ, “antaradhāneti kiṃ core na didikkhatī”ti paccudāhaṭaṃ

original: parehi, tampaṭipādayamāha-‘yatthādassana’miccādi, core na didikkhatī (tya), tra hi
analyzed: parehi core na hi

original: kintupaghātanivattiyāti evaṃ maññate “nātrāntaradhāname (vāvaseyaṃ), kintu tannimitto
analyzed: evam maññate na atra antaradhānam e vā avaseyam kintu tad nimittaḥ

original: paghātanivattipi, ‘upajjhāyā antaradhāyatī’tyatra vināpyupaghātasambhavamantaradhānasampādanameva
analyzed: upajjhāyā antaradhāyati iti atra vinā api upaghāta sambhavam antaradhāna sampādanam eva

analyzed: sambhavati iti icchati ggahaṇam kimattham a dassana icchāyam sati sati api dassane

analyzed: dassane tato ti upajjhāyataḥ avadhi rūpa tā eva ati upajjhāyassa avadhi rūpa tā eva

analyzed: vuttam tad āha viramaṇa ttha ityādi

original: Atoyevāti yato visessassa samānādhikaraṇattaṃ visesanāpekkhaṃ, atoyeva hetutoti attho,

original: Samānādhikaraṇattanti nīluppalasaddānaṃ visuṃvisuṃ yoge visiṭṭhadabba vācittassāsambhavā,

original: ca hotīti sambandho.
analyzed: ca hoti iti sambandhaḥ

original: Kāraṇamāha- ‘asambandhā’ti. Na hettha sambandho vasiṭṭhassa kambalāpekkhattena apaccassa

original: Yadi panettha ṇādippaccayo sabbathā sambandhamapekkhate, tadā visesato yassāpaccena sambandho tatova janakato so siyāti dassetumāha- ‘yajjeva’miccādi.

original: Yo janakoti yoyo yassa yassa apaccassa janako. Tatoyevāti tasmātasmā janakatoyeva.

analyzed: chā

original: 57. Kimhā
analyzed: kimhā

analyzed: tena

original: Sāmaññaṃ bhāvoti puthujjanādisāmaññaṃ bhāvoti attho. Alasassa bhāvo kiriyāsambandhittaṃ,

analyzed: tara

original: Nibbhīto tisūro vijayādibāhu vijayī so āsi laṅkissaro,
analyzed: nibbhītaḥ tisūraḥ vijaya ādi bāhu vijayī saḥ āsi laṅkissaro

original: Taṃ nissāya phalaṃ cirāya phalatañcetaṃ sataṃ santataṃ.
analyzed: tam nissāya phalam cirāya satam santatam

original: Siddhi ratthu
analyzed: siddhi ratthu

original: Aggammotivaṃsena, abhayārāmasāminā;
analyzed: aggammoti vaṃsena abhayā ārāma sāminā

original: Pañcikāvaṇṇanābhūtā, sā sāratthavilāsinī.
Mrammakkharamāropetvā, visodhetvā yathābalaṃ;
analyzed: mrammakkharam āropetvā yathābalam

original: Sakiyabyavahārena, tithīvasu karindunā.
analyzed: sa kiya byavahārena tithīvasu karindunā

original: Yutte vasse laṅkādīpā, saraṭṭhamāhatā puna;
analyzed: yutte vasse laṅkādīpā sa raṭṭham āhatā puna

original: Bhāssappadīpakātanta, kāsikāpañcikādihi.
analyzed: kāsikā pañcikā ādihi

original: Saṃsanditvā vicāretvā, vācetvāca punappunaṃ;
analyzed: saṃsanditvā vicāretvā punappunam

original: Ūnādhikādi dosāni, apanetvā sinesine.
analyzed: ūna adhika ādi dosāni apanetvā sinesine

original: Suddhaṭṭhake ca vassesā, pāpitā pakatiṭṭhitiṃ;
analyzed: suddhaṭṭhake ca vassa esā pāpitā pakati ṭṭhitim

original: Suddhāsuddhaṃva dassentī, sodhetu pāṭhasuddhiyā.
analyzed: dassentī sodhetu pāṭha suddhiyā
